::KitKat::

She looked at War. "I know that my spark will guide me War.  It's 
that I'm suposed to marry another.  Drillbit. He proposed a long time 
ago and I'm supposed to wed him." She looked back at the 
floor. "Oh...I just don'tknow what to do. I've never had this happen 
before. How do you choose like this?"  She sighed and found her spark 
being torn between two bots. She never thought, in her worst 
nightmares, that this could ever happen to her.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  "He knows. But like I said..he loves you. And why could you not 
return the 
> feelings. You never know till you try. Just put a little faith. 
Trust your 
> spark..and make sure you leave not regrets. I know that you will 
find the 
> truth thier." he pondred why should could nopt figure this out. He 
saw in her 
> eyes she cared for him. But he did not know if he imagined it or if 
she was 
> just plain afraid. And that would be a shame
